entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 27.
